text: William Walsh (fl. 1417) was an English politician and landowner. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Guildford in 1417. He had died by the 1460s, when his son's widow, Joan, was involved in a dispute over the considerable property inherited from Walsh.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/walsh- william ==References== Category:14th-century births Category:15th-century deaths Category:14th-century English people Category:English MPs 1417 Category:Members of Parliament for Guildford
title: William Walsh (MP for Guildford)
